mapper.insert: INSERT INTO postreactions (app_key,bus_id,bus_type,item_key,item_value,user_id,created_time) VALUES (#{appkey},#{busId},#{busType},#{itemKey},#{itemValue},#{userId},#{createdTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE item_value=VALUES(item_value),created_time=VALUES(created_time)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM postreactions WHERE app_key=#{appkey} AND bus_id=#{busId} AND bus_type=#{busType} AND item_key=#{key} AND user_id=#{userId}
